The ATO Dictionary

Source: vignettes/ato-dictionary.qmd

Find the Google Sheets version here.

slots

|slot |defining class |other classes |optional classes ||:—-|:————–|:————-|:——————||@det |ATO_det |data.frame |data.table, tibble ||@dep |ATO_dep |data.frame |data.table, tibble ||@tag |ATO_tag |data.frame |data.table, tibble ||@ani |ATO_ani |data.frame |data.table, tibble ||@obs |ATO_obs |data.frame |data.table, tibble ||@log |ATO_log |data.frame |data.table, tibble ||@tbl |ATO_tbl |character |NA |

columns

|slot (3 letters) |column name (snake case) |column type |auto or manual |short description ||:——————-|:————————|:———–|:————–|:———————————————————————————————————————————————-||@det (detections) |datetime |POSIXct |manual |date and time of the detection (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss) ||@det (detections) |frac_second |numeric |manual |fraction of the second when the detection was received ||@det (detections) |receiver_serial |integer |manual |serial number of the receiver that picked up the detection ||@det (detections) |transmitter |character |manual |transmitter picked up ||@det (detections) |sensor_value |numeric |manual |respective sensor value ||@det (detections) |… |any |manual |non-standard column names are allowed ||@det (detections) |valid |logical |automatic |Should this detection be used for analyses? ||@det (detections) |tag_match |logical |automatic |created by either match_det_tag or match_det_dep, indicates if detection matches a target transmitter (either in the tag slot or the dep slot) ||@det (detections) |dep_match |logical |automatic |created by match_det_tag, indicates if detection falls within a deployment period for a known receiver ||@det (detections) |animal |character |automatic |created by match_det_ani, when the ATO has both det, tag, and ani. Technically only needs the det and tag slots ||@dep (deployments) |receiver_manufacturer |character |manual |company that made the receiver ||@dep (deployments) |receiver_model |character |manual |model of the receiver ||@dep (deployments) |receiver_serial |integer |manual |serial code of the receiver (this is the column used to match deployments) ||@dep (deployments) |receiver_codeset |character |manual |codeset of the receiver ||@dep (deployments) |transmitter |character |manual |Can either be a beacon located inside a receiver, or a stationary reference transmitter ||@dep (deployments) |transmitter_manufacturer |character |manual |company that made the transmitter ||@dep (deployments) |transmitter_ping_rate |numeric |manual |ping rate of the transmitter ||@dep (deployments) |transmitter_model |character |manual |model of the transmitter ||@dep (deployments) |transmitter_serial |integer |manual |serial code of the transmitter ||@dep (deployments) |deploy_location |character |manual |name of the location where the receiver was deployed ||@dep (deployments) |deploy_datetime |POSIXct |manual |date and time of the deployment (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss) ||@dep (deployments) |deploy_lat |numeric |manual |latitude of the deployment ||@dep (deployments) |deploy_lon |numeric |manual |longitude of the deployment ||@dep (deployments) |deploy_z |numeric |manual |depth of the deployment (as measured from the reference surface of the waterbody) ||@dep (deployments) |recover_datetime |POSIXct |manual |date and time of the recovery (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss) ||@dep (deployments) |recover_lat |numeric |manual |latitude of the recovery ||@dep (deployments) |recover_lon |numeric |manual |longitude of the recovery ||@dep (deployments) |… |any |manual |non-standard column names are allowed ||@dep (deployments) |n_detections |numeric |automatic |created by match_det_dep. number of detections recorded during the deployment ||@tag |manufacturer |character |manual |company that made the tag ||@tag |model |character |manual |model of the tag ||@tag |power_level |numeric |manual |power level of the tag ||@tag |ping_rate |numeric |manual |ping rate of the tag ||@tag |ping_variation |numeric |manual |+- variation added to individual pings ||@tag |serial |integer |manual |serial code of the tag ||@tag |transmitter |character |manual |transmitter code emitted by the tag ||@tag |activation_datetime |POSIXct |manual |activation date ||@tag |battery_life |numeric |manual |battery life ||@tag |sensor_type |character |manual |sensor type associated with the transmitter (e.g. temperature) ||@tag |sensor_unit |character |manual |units of the sensor data collected (e.g. C) ||@tag |animal |character |manual |name/code of the animal that received the tag ||@tag |… |any |manual |non-standard column names are allowed ||@tag |det_match |logical |automatic |created by match_det_tag, indicates if the transmitter was ever detected ||@tag |obs_match |logical |automatic |created by match_obs_tag, indicates if the transmitter was ever observed ||@tag |ani_match |logical |automatic |created by match_tag_ani. Indicates if the value in @tag$animal matches a value in @ani$animal ||@ani (animal) |animal |character |manual |name/code of the animal ||@ani (animal) |capture_location |character |manual |place where the animal was caught ||@ani (animal) |capture_datetime |POSIXct |manual |date and time when the animal was caught ||@ani (animal) |capture_lat |numeric |manual |latitude of the capture ||@ani (animal) |capture_lon |numeric |manual |longitude of the capture ||@ani (animal) |release_location |character |manual |place where the animal was released ||@ani (animal) |release_datetime |POSIXct |manual |date and time when the animal was released ||@ani (animal) |release_lat |numeric |manual |latitude of the release ||@ani (animal) |release_lon |numeric |manual |longitude of the release ||@ani (animal) |… |any |manual |non-standard column names are allowed ||@ani (animal) |det_match |logical |automatic |created by match_det_ani, indicates if the animal was ever detected ||@ani (animal) |obs_match |logical |automatic |created by match_obs_ani. indicates if the anmal was ever observed ||@ani (animal) |tag_match |logical |automatic |created by match_tag_ani. Indicates if the animal has associated transmitters ||@obs (observations) |animal |character |manual |name/code of the observed animal ||@obs (observations) |transmitter |character |manual |transmitter detected ||@obs (observations) |type |character |manual |type of observation (e.g. manual tracking, visual, etc) ||@obs (observations) |terminal |logical |manual |does this observation mark the end of tracking for this animal ||@obs (observations) |location |character |manual |location of the observation ||@obs (observations) |datetime |POSIXct |manual |date and time of the observation ||@obs (observations) |lat |numeric |manual |latitude of the observation ||@obs (observations) |lon |numeric |manual |longitude of the observation ||@obs (observations) |… |any |manual |non-standard column names are allowed ||@obs (observations) |valid |logical |automatic |Should this observation be used for analyses? ||@obs (observations) |tag_match |logical |automatic |created by match_obs_tag. indicates if the observation matches a transmitter in the tag slot ||@obs (observations) |ani_match |logical |automatic |created by match_obs_ani. indicates if the observation matches an animal in the ani slot ||@log (internal log) |datetime |POSIXct |automatic |date and time of the entry ||@log (internal log) |package |character |automatic |package that wrote the entry ||@log (internal log) |call |character |automatic |function that wrote the entry ||@log (internal log) |log |character |automatic |summary of the changes introduced by the function ||@tbl |(character string) |character |automatic |Type of tables used in the ATO (data.frame, data.table, or tibble) |

methods

|method package |method family |method name |method signature |arguments |description ||:————–|:————-|:———–|:—————-|:————————–|:————————————————————————————————-||ATO |add |add |ATO, ATO_det |x, value |assign “value” to the @det slot of the ATO ||ATO |add |add |ATO, ATO_dep |x, value |assign “value” to the @dep slot of the ATO ||ATO |add |add |ATO, ATO_tag |x, value |assign “value” to the @tag slot of the ATO ||ATO |add |add |ATO, ATO_ani |x, value |assign “value” to the @ani slot of the ATO ||ATO |add |add |ATO, ATO_obs |x, value |assign “value” to the @obs slot of the ATO ||ATO |get_ |get_det |ATO |x, receivers, transmitters |extract the @det slot from the ATO. arguments allow refining which detections are extracted. ||ATO |get_ |get_det_dep |ATO |x, receivers |wrapper to extract the @det slot from the ATO and filter only the transmitters listed in @det ||ATO |get_ |get_det_tag |ATO |x, receivers |wrapper to extract the @det slot from the ATO and filter only the transmitters listed in the @tag ||ATO |get_ |get_dep |ATO |x |extract the @dep slot from the ATO ||ATO |get_ |det_tag |ATO |x |extract the @tag slot from the ATO ||ATO |get_ |det_ani |ATO |x |extract the @ani slot from the ATO ||ATO |get_ |det_obs |ATO |x |extract the @obs slot from the ATO ||ATO |show |show |ATO |object |default function called when an object of class ATO is displayed on screen ||ATO |summary |summary |ATO_det |object |prints a summary of the det slot ||ATO |summary |summary |ATO_dep |object |prints a summary of the dep slot ||ATO |summary |summary |ATO_tag |object |prints a summary of the tag slot ||ATO |summary |summary |ATO_ani |object |prints a summary of the ani slot ||ATO |summary |summary |ATO_obs |object |prints a summary of the obs slot ||ATO |summary |summary |ATO_log |object |prints a summary of the log slot ||NA |check |NA |NA |NA |NA ||NA |check |NA |NA |NA |NA ||NA |check |NA |NA |NA |NA ||NA |check |NA |NA |NA |NA ||NA |check |NA |NA |NA |NA ||NA |check |NA |NA |NA |NA |
